mapper.insert: insert into member (id, name, password) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password})
mapper.select: select * from ms_agent where addr_zip like '서울%'

select cd_agent,nm_agentform, addr_zip, addr_detail, earth_distance(ll_to_earth(#{lat}, #{lng}), ll_to_earth(lat, lng) ) as distance from ms_agent where addr_zip like '${location}%' order by distance ASC limit 1;
